message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $15,000. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I think it's a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Hi Bob, I understand your perspective. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? This offer reflects the true value of the product.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
